title: The Circle's Woody reveals his parents are Fatboy Slim and Zoe Ball
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

The Circle’s Woody finally revealed his famous parents to blocked contestant Joyce on the latest episode of the series.

The 18-year-old, who was unmasked as the secret influencer, paid a visit to catfishers Beth and Jack’s flat where he told them he’s the son of DJ Fatboy Slim and It Takes Two’s Zoe Ball.

After blocking the pair from the game, Woody began: ‘I’ve also got a bit of a secret. I haven’t lied about me, but my parents are famous but I didn’t want that to be me.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

He then said: ‘So my dad is DJ Fatboy Slim, Norman Cook, and my mum’s Zoe Ball, the radio and TV presenter.’

‘Are you joking me?’ gasped Beth in disbelief.

‘Nah, I’m not joking,’ Woody replied. ‘No one knows but you guys. I’m not telling anyone.’

Woody’s parents are Fatboy Slim and Zoe Ball (Picture: Getty)

Viewers raced to Twitter to praise Norman and Zoe for raising such a ‘nice kid’, with one fan writing: ‘@C4TheCircle I bet Woody’s parents are so proud of him, he’s such a genuinely lovely guy, hope him, Tim or Ella win #thecircle.’

Echoing a similar sentiment, another added: ‘How bloody lovely is #Woody on #TheCircle, his kindness knows no bounds bet his parents are proud, I would be.’

Nobody: Woody: MY PARENTS ARE ZOE BALL AND FATBOY SLIM!!!!#TheCircle — Hannah Terry (@hannahterry_) October 14, 2019

Woody is an absolute credit to his parents. Such a nice kid you should be proud! @ZoeTheBall @FatboySlim #TheCircle — Jordan Claude (@JCAW_) October 14, 2019

It won’t get old watching Woody tell people his dads fatboy slim like, can’t wait for the others to find out #thecircle — Charlotte Pole (@charlottepolexx) October 14, 2019

@C4TheCircle I bet woody's parents are so proud of him, hes such a genuinely lovely guy, hope him, Tim or Ella win #thecircle — Lamb Chop (@LambCho91708614) October 14, 2019

I am loving #TheCircle – sad it's the final week. #Woody is such a lovely guy & I have so much respect for him keeping his parents a secret, some people would use that to get further. No-one needs to know, they can get to know him by himself. — CrysTalks (@CrysTalksVlogs) October 14, 2019

How bloody lovely is #woody on #TheCircle, his kindness knows no bounds bet his parents are proud, I would be. — ☘Charly☘ (@charlyhenny) October 14, 2019

Advertisement

Advertisement

Woody also revealed his gameplan to dumped contestants Beth and Jack, telling them: ‘I’m trying to be myself and I’m trying to spread positivity and no snakey movements.

‘I’m just being myself, I’m trying to do the best in every situation’

He continued: ‘If I don’t win, I don’t win but I’m always going to stay true to that.

‘And in the final I have the chance to snake someone, I will not, I will lose.’

What a champ.

The Circle airs weekdays at 10pm on Channel 4.

description: The Circle's Woody finally comes clean about his dad being Fatboy Slim and mum being It Takes Two's Zoe Ball.
